ygData.subject: Petition for less revealing clothing?
ygData.msgSnippet: As most of you know an Everquets expansion is going to come out around Christmas.  One of the things I d like to set up is a petition to get less revealing
ygData.messageBody:
As most of you know an Everquets expansion is going to come out around
Christmas. One of the things I'd like to set up is a petition to get
less revealing clothing options for everquest characters. In particular,
I think you should be able to set your newbie (naked) clothing to be something
better than, for example, a dark elf bikini. It would also be nice if you
didn't have to wear plate mail before you could get armor that didn't look
like fine mesh with an exposed neckline.

I'd want this to be an online petition, maybe associated with one of the
Everquest websites. Does anyone know if any of those sites have those
sorts of things? I've seen lots of 'polls' (but really I don't want to do
this as a poll, otherwise all the 16 year old boys will vote no). I want
something where you can submit a form I guess.

- Christina
